name: The Legend of the Lessir Moresoul
name_original: The Legend of the Lessir Moresoul
description:
Play as a Moresoul who wakes up to find themselves with the Lessir gift, a gift that can bring balance back to his world-muddled in bright colors and funny beings.

Z/Space/Enter- Confirm/Interact
X - Cancel
Arrow Keys - Move

TIP: Three enemies need to be defeated for the last cutscene.

NOTE: The program I use doesn't export games as .exe applications, instead the user needs to install runtime package (which is labeled as setup) to play the game. Sorry for the inconvenience!

This game was made for the Blackthornprod game jam. Following along with the jam's theme "Less is More", it ended up being incorporated into the story as a whole than a mechanic. I would consider this game more of an episode rather than a full story due to 5 out of the 7 jam days I was able to work on it. Music, sprite and art graphics are made completely by me. The sound effects default presets from RPG Maker 2003!
